Scroll Progress Bar: https://www.30secondsofcode.org/css/s/scroll-progress-bar

firebase push/update:
/*https://stackoverflow.com/questions/16637035/in-firebase-when-using-push-how-do-i-pull-the-unique-id


To get uniqueID after push() you must use this variant:

// Generate a reference to a new location and add some data using push()
 var newPostRef = postsRef.push();
// Get the unique key generated by push()
var postId = newPostRef.key;
You generate a new Ref when you push() and using .key of this ref you can get uniqueID.



    https://www.google.com/search?q=edit+realtime+database+data&rlz=1C1CHBF_enIN863IN863&oq=edit+realtime+database+data&aqs=chrome..69i57.5681j0j1&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8
    https://firebase.google.com/docs/database/web/read-and-write#web-version-8_5
    https://www.google.com/search?q=can+realtime+database+data+be+modified&rlz=1C1CHBF_enIN863IN863&oq=can+realtime+database+data+be+modified&aqs=chrome..69i57.7696j0j1&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8
    https://medium.com/@hasangi/writing-deleting-and-updating-data-in-firebase-realtime-database-with-javascript-f26113ec8c93


*/
